hero.title: Jump into your new sneakers
hero.text: Find your shoes from our various collections.

spotlight.title: Here you will find exceptional quality shoes
spotlight.text:
Welcome to our sneaker store! We are excited to offer you a wide selection of high-quality sneakers from the best manufacturers. Our store is dedicated to providing you with the latest trends. 
We are confident that you will find the perfect pair of sneakers to suit your needs and style.

catalog.title: Find your new sneakers
catalog.text: Explore our catalog and find your best fit.
